summary: Adds a fancy gilded sword to the game, fit for a paladin or any opulent bastard. It can be found next to the treasure chest at Valtheim Towers, and has the same damage as a Glass Sword.
descriptionHtml:
Adds a fancy gilded sword to the game, fit for a paladin or any opulent bastard. It can be found next to the treasure chest at Valtheim Towers. It is unenchanted and does the same damage as a Glass Sword. The blade is made of silver, so it does extra damage to undead, and can be improved with a silver ingot.

Feel free to use the model for your own mod if you want.
author: Herteby
